examples.title: Header-Example:
Success-Example:
UnauthorizedError
InternalServerError:

title: Check eligibility for a delivery
description: Check if a delivery can be handled by you2you based on the package(s) information and the destination and pickup addresses.
name: CheckDeliveryEligibility

examples.title: Request-Example:
Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 Success
{
    "valid": true,
    "postalCodePickup": true,
    "postalCodeDeposit": true,
    "size": true,
    "weight": true,
    "distance": true
}

examples.title: ValidationError
InternalServerError:

Parameter.description: A datetime value which represents when the delivery should start. Should be in the format yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm[:ss]
A datetime value which represents when the delivery should be over. It's often +2 hours than the shipStart. Should be in the format yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm[:ss]
The dimension for the products. Should be an array of json objects.
The title for the contact, for examle, Mr., Miss, etc.
Contact address that also represents the pickup address for the delivery
The title for the customer, for examle, Mr., Miss, etc.
Customer address that also represents the destination address for the delivery

title: Get the price for a delivery
description: Get the price for the delivery based on the package(s) information and the destination and pickup addresses.
name: GetDeliveryPricing

Parameter.description: The dimension of the delivery (product) to deliver.

examples.title: Request-Example:
Success-Response:
ValidationError
InternalServerError:

title: Cancel delivery
description:
You can cancel a delivery with theses rules:

  • If status < 2 = Free
  • If status = 2 & Now < End pickup - 2 Hours = Half price
  • Otherwise impossible to cancel a delivery, please contact our support team.
name: cancel

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content: HTTP/1.1 204 No Content

title: Retrieve a delivery with an unique id.
description: Retrieve all informations of delivery with an unique id.
name: getById
